# emissiveIntensity

**Instance Property**

The intensity of light emitted by the entity.

## Declaration

```swift
var emissiveIntensity: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

To make a material *emissive* and appear to emit light, set this property to a value greater than zero and set [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicallyBasedMaterial/emissiveColor-swift.property] to a value other than black. RealityKit multiplies [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicallyBasedMaterial/emissiveColor-swift.property] by this value, so the higher the value, the more intense the entity’s emission of light.

You can set this property to values greater than `1.0`.

## Adding light emission

- **emissiveColor**: The color of the light the entity emits.
